item.description:
Because the last one was such a success and well, it's been awhile.

Congratulations, everyone; we did it! We survived a blizzard named after a cartoon fish. We endured Facebook feeds saturated with blizzard pics, Disney memes, and "SNOMG!" I'd like to think that we're a lot closer now as a city.
We've walked out into some strange bleached-white morning without motorcars, a bounty of pristine snow that we would later turn into igloos and retarded snowmen with a little encouragement from our 40oz friends.
Our lats are so ridiculously buff with all the shoveling and re-shoveling, and we've added to our collection of chairs (Thanks, street-chair fairy!). The roads were claimed by giddy kids on skis, snowshoes and insane joggers and we transformed greasy pizza boxes into makeshift sleds.

But a lot of us were stuck inside for far too long (did anyone NOT watch House of Cards?) and let's face it, we're fucking stir-crazy! Now is the perfect time to get out of our hibernation dens and rock out to sweet tunes and hangout with righteous dudes and dudettes.

Just like before if you feel inclined then make a short playlist of your favorite blizzard/winter tunes to share with everyone else, or just shit that you like to dance to. BYOB and snacks.

My apartment is much too small to host this type of event but because of my connections at Harvard I'm able to reserve a room large enough to make this awesome.

Please vote for a date in the poll below.

http://doodle.com/btfagca3epd5qpii
item.name: Indie Rock Easter Social
